trans-unit.source: Represents an interoperable binding that supports distributed transactions and secure, reliable sessions.
The wsHttpBinding is a secure, reliable, interoperable binding suitable for non-duplex service contracts.
The binding implements the following specifications: WS-ReliableMessaging for reliability and WS-Security for message security and authentication.
The transport is HTTP and message encoding is Text/XML encoding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"></xref> class.
The configuration name of the binding.
This value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the WCF client will automatically store and resend any cookies sent by a single web service.
Setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A> to `true` is useful when a client is interacting with one web service that uses cookies.

If you are accessing multiple services with the same cookie, set <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement.AllowCookies%2A> to `false` and you will have to manually add the cookie header to each outgoing message.
The following code shows how to do this:
`True` if automatic cookies processing is required; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the type of this binding element.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of this binding element.
Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding element.
A binding element.
Called when the content of a specified binding collection is applied to this binding configuration element.
A collection of binding elements.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
Gets the type of security to be used with this binding.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpSecurityElement"></xref> that is used with this binding.
